duties_responsibilities.duty: Dispensing prescriptions and coordinating clinical services for specialty drugs.
Interacting with healthcare professionals to provide and coordinate customer care.
Reviewing and completing criteria based on prior authorization as per policy and procedure.
Translating prescriptions and dispensing prescribed pharmaceuticals.
Communicating by telephone with patients and physicians for patient care.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in pharmacy or Pharm D.
Active state license in good standing with at least two years’ experience as a pharmacist.
